roleset.name: confine, restrict
roleset.note: CONFINE-V NOTES: Passive seems to always include the modifier 'largely'. (from confine.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: [Arbitrage-related trading during the session]-1 was confined *trace*-1 largely to a round of buy programs near the close, which helped offset the impact of profit-taking among blue chips.
